amendment.description: To place flexible limits on the use of information obtained using unlawful procedures.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3915 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 40 - 56. Record Vote Number: 11.

action.text: Amendment SA 3915 proposed by Senator Feingold to Amendment SA 3911. (consideration: CR S577-580; text: CR S577) To place flexible limits on the use of information obtained using unlawful procedures.
